title: MerchantTemplateSchema
description: Represents the serializable schema for a merchant template

ItemsForSale.description:
A collection of items that this merchant will sell. If stock is set to -1, the merchant will have infinite stock of
it.

ItemsToBuy.description: A collection of items(Item Template Keys) that this merchant will buy

Name.description: The name of this merchant as displayed to aislings

RestockIntervalHrs.description: Defaults to 6 hours. If this merchant sells items, this specifies how often the merchant will restock those items

RestockPct.description: Defaults to 100%. If this merchant sells items, this specifies the percentage of items that will be restocked

ScriptKeys.description: A collection of names of scripts to attach to this object by default

ScriptVars.description:
A collection of key-value pairs of key-value pairs

Each script that has variables needs a scriptName-Value pair, and the value of that entry is a dictionary of
propertyName-Value pairs

SkillsToTeach.description: A collection of skills (Skill Template Keys) that this merchant will teach

SpellsToTeach.description: A collection of spells (Spell Template Keys) that this merchant will teach

Sprite.description: The sprite id of the merchant minus the offset

TemplateKey.description: A unique id specific to this template. Best practice is to match the file name

WanderIntervalMs.description: The number of milliseconds between movements while this merchant is wandering

ItemDetailsSchema.description: Represents the serializable schema of the details of an item being sold by a merchant

ItemTemplateKey.description: The key of the item template being sold

Stock.description: The amount of this item the merchant has in stock
